languages.text: Невозможно определить кому принадлежали сокровища, до того как их украли пираты. Теперь эти реликвии — ваши. Среди награбленного добра вы также обнаруживаете плащ с багряным подбоем, судя по всему, когда-то принадлежавший одному из Адептус Арбитес.

traits.locale_text: Невозможно определить кому принадлежали сокровища, до того как их украли пираты. Теперь эти реликвии принадлежат вам по праву. Среди награбленного добра вы также обнаруживаете плащ с багряным подбоем, судя по всему, когда-то принадлежавший одному из судей Адептус Арбайтес.

languages.text: It is impossible to tell to whom the relics belonged before they were stolen by the pirates. Now these relics are yours. Among the loot you also find a cloak adorned with crimson lining, apparently once belonging to a member of the Adeptus Arbites.
languages.original_text: Невозможно определить кому принадлежали сокровища, до того как их украли пираты. Теперь эти реликвии — ваши. Среди награбленного добра вы также обнаруживаете плащ с багряным подбоем, судя по всему, когда-то принадлежавший одному из Адептус Арбитес.

traits.locale_text: It is impossible to tell to whom the relics belonged before they were stolen by the pirates. Now these relics are yours. Among the loot you also find a cloak adorned with crimson lining, apparently once belonging to a member of the Adeptus Arbites.

It is impossible to tell whom the relics belonged before they were stolen by the pirates. Now these relics are yours. Among the loot you also find a cloak adorned with crimson lining, apparently once belonging to a Judge of the Adeptus Arbites.

It is impossible to tell to whom the relics belonged before they were stolen by the pirates. Now these relics are yours. Among the loot you also find a cloak adorned with crimson lining, apparently once belonging to a member of the Adeptus Arbites.

It is impossible to tell to whom the relics belonged before they were stolen by the pirates. Now these relics are yours. Among the loot you also find a cloak adorned with crimson lining, apparently once belonging to a member of the Adeptus Arbites.

languages.text: 虽然不知道这些被海盗夺走的遗物属于什么人，但如今它们都归你所有。在这些战利品中，你发现了一件装饰着深红色内衬的斗篷。很显然，它曾经属于法务部的某位成员。
languages.original_text: It is impossible to tell to whom the relics belonged before they were stolen by the pirates. Now these relics are yours. Among the loot you also find a cloak adorned with crimson lining, apparently once belonging to a member of the Adeptus Arbites.

traits.locale_text: 虽然不知道这些被海盗夺走的遗物属于什么人，但如今它们都归你所有。在这些战利品中，你发现了一件装饰着深红色内衬的斗篷。很显然，它曾经属于法务部的某位成员。
虽然不知道这些被海盗夺走的遗物属于什么人，但如今它们都归你所有。在这些战利品中，你发现了一件装饰着深红色内衬的斗篷。很显然，它曾经属于法务部的某位仲裁官。

languages.text: 海賊に盗まれる前の遺物が誰のものであったかはわからない。だが今はあなたのものだ。戦利品の中には、かつて高等裁定局の裁判官が持っていたらしい、真紅の裏地で飾られたマントもある。
languages.original_text: It is impossible to tell to whom the relics belonged before they were stolen by the pirates. Now these relics are yours. Among the loot you also find a cloak adorned with crimson lining, apparently once belonging to a member of the Adeptus Arbites.

traits.locale_text: 海賊に盗まれる前の遺物が誰のものであったかはわからない。だが今はあなたのものだ。戦利品の中には、かつて高等裁定局の裁判官が持っていたらしい、真紅の裏地で飾られたマントもある。
海賊に盗まれる前の遺物が誰のものであったかはわからない。だが今はあなたのものだ。戦利品の中には、かつて高等裁定局の裁判官が持っていたらしい、真紅の裏地で飾られたマントもある。

languages.text: Es imposible saber a quién pertenecían las reliquias antes de que las robaran los piratas. Ahora estas reliquias son tuyas. Entre el botín también encuentras una capa decorada con un forro carmesí, que al parecer perteneció en su día a un miembro del Adeptus Arbites.
languages.original_text: It is impossible to tell to whom the relics belonged before they were stolen by the pirates. Now these relics are yours. Among the loot you also find a cloak adorned with crimson lining, apparently once belonging to a member of the Adeptus Arbites.

traits.locale_text: Es imposible saber a quién pertenecían las reliquias antes de que las robaran los piratas. Ahora estas reliquias son tuyas. Entre el botín también encuentras una capa decorada con un forro carmesí, que al parecer perteneció en su día a un miembro del Adeptus Arbites.

languages.text: Es lässt sich unmöglich sagen, wem die Relikte einmal gehört haben, bevor die Piraten sie gestohlen haben. Nun gehören sie dir. Unter der Beute findest du auch einen Umhang mit einem roten Futter, der offenbar einmal einem Mitglied der Adeptus Arbites gehört hat.
languages.original_text: It is impossible to tell to whom the relics belonged before they were stolen by the pirates. Now these relics are yours. Among the loot you also find a cloak adorned with crimson lining, apparently once belonging to a member of the Adeptus Arbites.

traits.locale_text: Es lässt sich unmöglich sagen, wem die Relikte einmal gehört haben, bevor die Piraten sie gestohlen haben. Nun gehören sie dir. Unter der Beute findest du auch einen Umhang mit einem roten Futter, der offenbar einmal einem Mitglied der Adeptus Arbites gehört hat.

languages.text: À qui appartenaient ces reliques avant que les pirates ne s'en emparent ? Impossible de le dire, mais à présent, elles sont tout à vous. Parmi le butin, vous découvrez également une cape à la doublure écarlate ayant appartenu autrefois à un membre de l'Adeptus Arbites.
languages.original_text: It is impossible to tell to whom the relics belonged before they were stolen by the pirates. Now these relics are yours. Among the loot you also find a cloak adorned with crimson lining, apparently once belonging to a member of the Adeptus Arbites.

traits.locale_text: À qui appartenaient ces reliques avant que les pirates ne s'en emparent ? Impossible de le dire, mais à présent, elles sont tout à vous. Parmi le butin, vous découvrez également une cape à la doublure écarlate ayant appartenu autrefois à un juge de l'Adeptus Arbites.

À qui appartenaient ces reliques avant que les pirates ne s'en emparent ? Impossible de le dire, mais à présent, elles sont tout à vous. Parmi le butin, vous découvrez également une cape à la doublure écarlate ayant appartenu autrefois à un juge de l'Adeptus Arbites.

languages.text: Korsanlar çalmadan önce bu yadigârların kime ait olduğunu bilmek mümkün değil. Artık seninler. Yadigârlar arasında, bir zamanlar bir Adeptus Arbites mensubuna ait olan, kırmızı astarlı bir pelerin de buluyorsun.
languages.original_text: It is impossible to tell to whom the relics belonged before they were stolen by the pirates. Now these relics are yours. Among the loot you also find a cloak adorned with crimson lining, apparently once belonging to a member of the Adeptus Arbites.

traits.locale_text: Korsanlar çalmadan önce bu yadigârların kime ait olduğunu bilmek mümkün değil. Artık seninler. Yadigârlar arasında, bir zamanlar bir Adeptus Arbites yargıcına ait olan, kırmızı astarlı bir pelerin de buluyorsun.

Korsanlar çalmadan önce bu yadigârların kime ait olduğunu bilmek mümkün değil. Artık seninler. Yadigârlar arasında, bir zamanlar bir Adeptus Arbites mensubuna ait olan, kırmızı astarlı bir pelerin de buluyorsun.
